stratagems.name: CAREEN!
stratagems.fluff:
If their vehicle is on its last legs, any Ork
worth their steering wheel will aim its
blazing remains into the nearest cluster
of enemies. The ensuing explosions never
fail to raise a rousing cheer from nearby
Ork onlookers.
stratagems.when:
Any phase, just after an Orks
Vehicle unit from your army with the
Deadly Demise ability is destroyed.
stratagems.target:
That destroyed Orks Vehicle
unit, if you roll a 6 for its Deadly Demise
ability. You can use this Stratagem on that
unit even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effect:
Your unit can make a Normal or
Fall Back move before its Deadly Demise
ability is resolved, and before any
embarked units perform an Emergency
Disembarkation. When making this move,
your unit can move over enemy units
(excluding Monsters and Vehicles) as if
they were not there.

stratagems.name: ORKS IS NEVER BEATEN
stratagems.fluff:
So resilient is Ork physiology – and so
slow are Orks on the uptake – that even
killing wounds can take a while to register.
stratagems.when:
Fight phase, just after an enemy
unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target:
One Orks unit from your army
that was selected as the target of one or
more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect:
Until the end of the phase, each
time a model in your unit is destroyed, if
that model has not fought this phase, do
not remove it from play. The destroyed
model can fight after the attacking
model’s unit has finished making attacks,
and is then removed from play.

stratagems.name: UNBRIDLED CARNAGE
stratagems.fluff:
When Orks get stuck into the foe, the
carnage is wonderful to behold, at least
for other Orks.
stratagems.target:
One Orks unit from your army
that has not been selected to fight
this phase.
stratagems.effect:
Until the end of the phase, each
time an Orks model in your unit makes a
melee attack, an unmodified hit roll of 5+
scores a Critical Hit.

stratagems.name: ’ARD AS NAILS
stratagems.fluff:
Even the lowliest Ork Boy can take a
tremendous amount of punishment before
being slain.
stratagems.when:
Your opponent’s Shooting phase or
the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit
has selected its targets.
stratagems.target:
One Orks unit from your army
that was selected as the target of one or
more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect:
Until the end of the phase, each
time an attack targets your unit, subtract
1 from the Wound roll.
stratagems.restrictions:
You cannot select
a Vehicle or Gretchin unit for
this Stratagem.

stratagems.name: MOB RULE
stratagems.fluff:
The more Orks that gather in one place the
more the Waaagh! energy flows, and the
more fearless they all become.
stratagems.target:
One Mob unit from your army that
contains 10 or more models and is not
Below Half-strength.
stratagems.effect:
Until the end of the phase, while
a friendly Orks Infantry unit is within 6"
of that Mob unit, that Orks Infantry unit
can still be selected as the target of your
Stratagems even if it is Battle-shocked.

stratagems.name: ERE WE GO
stratagems.fluff:
’Even lumbering Orks can put on a
surprising turn of speed when the promise
of a good face-to-face fight is in the offing.
Once a horde of Orks get a sight of the foe,
nothing can stop them.
stratagems.target:
One Orks Infantry unit from
your army.
stratagems.effect:
Until the end of the turn, add 2
to Advance and Charge rolls made for
your unit.

enhancements.name: FOLLOW ME LADZ
enhancements.description: Orks model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, add 2" to the Move characteristic of models in that unit.

enhancements.name: HEADWOPPA’S KILLCHOPPA
enhancements.description: Orks model only. Melee weapons equipped by the bearer that do not have the [EXTRA ATTACKS] ability have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

enhancements.name: KUNNIN’ BUT BRUTAL
enhancements.description: Orks model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, that unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

enhancements.name: SUPA-CYBORK BODY
enhancements.description: Orks model only. The bearer has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

datasheets.name: Battlewagon
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: tracks and wheels.
wargear: This model can be equipped with one of the following: ◦ 1 kannon ◦ 1 killkannon ◦ 1 zzap gun
This model can be equipped with: ◦ 1 lobba
This model can be equipped with up to 4 big shootas.
This model’s tracks and wheels can be replaced with 1 deff rolla.
This model can be equipped with any of the following: ◦ 1 ’ard case ◦ 1 grabbin’ klaw ◦ 1 wreckin’ ball
datasheets.transport: This model has a transport capacity of 22 Orks Infantry models. If this model is equipped with a killkannon, it has a transport capacity of 12 Orks Infantry models. Each Mega Armour or Jump Pack model takes up the space of 2 models. If this model is not equipped with an ’ard case, kannon, killkannon or zzap gun, it can transport 1 Ghazghkull Thraka. Ghazghkull Thraka takes up the space of 18 models.

wargear.name: ’Ard Case
wargear.description: Add 2 to the bearer’s Toughness characteristic, but it no longer has the Firing Deck ability.

other.name: Ramshackle but Rugged
other.description: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Killa Kans

wargear: Each Killa Kan’s Kan shoota can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 grotzooka ◦ 1 rokkit launcha ◦ 1 skorcha

other.name: Shooty Power Trip
other.description: Each time this unit is selected to shoot, you can roll one D6: on a 1, the nearest other friendly Orks unit within 12" of and visible to this unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 2+, until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability.

datasheets.name: Kommandos
datasheets.loadout: Every model is equipped with: slugga; choppa.
wargear: The Boss Nob’s choppa can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 big choppa ◦ 1 power klaw
Up to 2 Kommandos can each have their slugga and choppa replaced with 1 speshul Kommando shoota and 1 close combat weapon.
1 Kommando’s slugga and choppa can be replaced with 1 breacha ram.
1 Kommando’s slugga and choppa can be replaced with 1 burna and 1 close combat weapon.
1 Kommando’s slugga and choppa can be replaced with 1 rokkit launcha and 1 close combat weapon.
This unit can be equipped with 1 bomb squig.
This unit can be equipped with 1 distraction grot.

wargear.name: Distraction Grot
wargear.description: Once per battle, in your opponent’s Shooting phase, before making a saving throw for a model in this unit, it can deploy the distraction grot. If it does, until the end of the phase, models in this unit have a 5+ invulnerable save.

other.name: Sneaky Surprise
other.description: Enemy units cannot use the Fire Overwatch Stratagem to shoot at this unit.

datasheets.name: Kustom Boosta-blasta
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: burna exhausts; grot blasta; rivet kannon; spiked wheels.
wargear: None

other.name: Rivetin’ Dakka
other.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks made with a rivet kannon. Until the start of your next turn, that enemy unit is suppressed. While a unit is suppressed, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Lootas
composition: 4-12 Lootas * This unit must contain 1 Spanner for every 4 Lootas it contains.
datasheets.loadout: Every Spanner is equipped with: big shoota; close combat weapon. Every Loota is equipped with: deffgun; close combat weapon.
wargear: Any number of Spanners can each have their big shoota replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 kustom mega-blasta ◦ 1 rokkit launcha
leadBy: Big Mek With Kustom Force Field

datasheets.name: Mad Dok Grotsnik
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ Boyz ■ Burna Boyz ■ Tankbustas ■ Lootas ■ Nobz
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: slugga; power klaw; ’urty syringe.
wargear: None

other.name: Mad Dok
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

other.name: One Scalpel Short of a Medpack
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, that unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

datasheets.name: Mega Dread
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 boombits; killkannon; dread rippa klaw; stompy feet.
wargear: This model’s killkannon can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 dread killsaw ◦ 1 dread rippa klaw
This model’s dread rippa klaw can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 dread killsaw ◦ 1 killkannon

other.name: Mega Carnage
other.description: Each time this model is selected to fight, you can select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it and roll one D6, adding 2 to the result if this model made a Charge move this turn: on a 4-5, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6+, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds.

other.name: Dead Rippy
other.description: If this model is equipped with 2 dread killsaws, those weapons have the [TWIN-LINKED] ability. If this model is equipped with 2 dread rippa klaws, those weapons have the [TWIN-LINKED] ability.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Meganobz
datasheets.loadout: Every model is equipped with: kustom shoota; power klaw.
wargear: Any number of models can each have their kustom shoota and power klaw replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 kombi-weapon and 1 power klaw ◦ 1 kombi-weapon and 1 killsaw ◦ 1 kustom shoota and 1 killsaw ◦ 1 killsaw and 1 power klaw ◦ 1 twin killsaw

other.name: Krumpin’ Time
other.description: During the battle round in which you call a Waaagh!, melee weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

datasheets.name: Megatrakk Scrapjet
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: rokkit kannon; twin big shoota; wing missiles; nose drill.
wargear: None

other.name: Drill Through
other.description: Each time this model ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it and roll one D6: on a 2-5, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds.

datasheets.name: Mek
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ Boyz ■ Lootas ■ Mek Gunz ■ Nobz ■ Tankbustas
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: kustom mega-slugga; wrench.
wargear: This model’s wrench can be replaced with 1 killsaw.

other.name: Mekboy
other.description: While this model is within 3" of one or more friendly Orks Vehicle units, this model has the Lone Operative ability.

other.name: Mekaniak
other.description: At the end of your Movement phase, you can select one friendly Orks Vehicle model within 3" of this model. That Vehicle model regains up to D3 lost wounds, and, until the start of your next Movement phase, each time that Vehicle model makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. Each model can only be selected for this ability once per turn.

datasheets.name: Mek Gunz
datasheets.loadout: Every model is equipped with: smasha gun; grot crew. Designer’s Note: Place five Grot Crew tokens next to each Mek Gun model when this unit is first set up, removing one each time its Mek Gun model loses a wound (a Mek Gun model itself is considered to represent its final wound).
wargear: Each model’s smasha gun can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 bubblechukka ◦ 1 kustom mega-kannon ◦ 1 traktor kannon

other.name: Splat!
other.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets a unit containing 10 or more models, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

leadBy: Big Mek With Shokk Attack Gun

datasheets.name: Meka-dread
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: killkannon; dread rippa klaw; stompy feet.
wargear: This model’s killkannon can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 dread killsaw ◦ 1 dread rippa klaw
This model’s dread rippa klaw can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 dread killsaw ◦ 1 killkannon

other.name: Mekaniak
other.description: At the end of your Movement phase, you can select one friendly Orks Vehicle model within 3" of this model. That Vehicle model regains up to D3 lost wounds, and, until the start of your next Movement phase, each time that Vehicle model makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. Each model can only be selected for this ability once per turn.

other.name: Dead Rippy
other.description: If this model is equipped with 2 dread killsaws, those weapons have the [TWIN-LINKED] ability. If this model is equipped with 2 dread rippa klaws, those weapons have the [TWIN-LINKED] ability.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Morkanaut
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: kustom mega-blasta; kustom mega-zappa; 2 rokkit launchas; 2 twin big shootas; klaw of Mork.
wargear: None
datasheets.transport: This model has a transport capacity of 12 Orks Infantry models. Each Mega Armour or Jump Pack model takes up the space of 2 models. It cannot transport Ghazghkull Thraka.

other.name: Clankin’ Forward
other.description: Each time this model makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, it can move over enemy models (excluding Monster and Vehicle models) and terrain features that are 4" or less in height as if they were not there.

other.name: Big an’ Shooty
other.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack during the battle round in which you called a Waaagh!, add 1 to the Hit roll.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-7 wounds remaining, subtract 4 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic, and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Mozrog Skragbad
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: thump gun; Big Chompa’s jaws; gutrippa.
wargear: None

other.name: Da Bigger Dey iz…
other.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a Monster or Vehicle unit, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of that attack. Each time this model makes an attack that targets a Titanic unit, add 2 to the Damage characteristic of that attack instead.

other.name: Hungry Chompa
other.description: Each time this model declares a charge, until the end of the turn, each time this model makes an attack, an unmodified successful Wound roll of 5+ scores a Critical Wound.

datasheets.name: Nob On Smasha Squig
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: ■ Squighog Boyz
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: slugga; big choppa; smasha squig jaws.
wargear: None

other.name: Hogboss
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

other.name: Hunt Them Down
other.description: During the battle round in which you call a Waaagh!, this model’s big choppa has the [ANTI-MONSTER 3+] and [ANTI-VEHICLE 3+] abilities.

datasheets.name: Nob With Waaagh! Banner
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ Boyz ■ Nobz
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: kustom shoota; Waaagh! banner.
wargear: None

other.name: Plant the Waaagh! Banner
other.description: Once per battle, at the start of the battle round, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the start of the next battle round, this model’s unit gains the benefits of the Waaagh! ability as if you had called a Waaagh! this battle round.

other.name: Da Boss Iz Watchin’
other.description: While this model is gaining the benefits of the Waaagh! ability, it has a 4+ invulnerable save and an Objective Control characteristic of 5.

datasheets.name: Nobz
datasheets.loadout: Every model is equipped with: slugga; big choppa.
wargear: Any number of models can each have their big choppa replaced with 1 power klaw.
Any number of models can each have their slugga and big choppa replaced with 1 kombi-weapon and 1 close combat weapon.
For every 5 models in this unit, this unit can be equipped with 1 ammo runt.

wargear.name: Ammo Runt
wargear.description: Once per battle for each ammo runt this unit has, when this unit is selected to shoot, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

other.name: Da Boss’ Ladz
other.description: While a Warboss model is leading this unit, each time an attack targets this unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

leadBy: Big Mek With Kustom Force Field

datasheets.name: Nobz On Warbikes
datasheets.loadout: Every model is equipped with: twin dakkagun; choppa; close combat weapon.
wargear: Any number of models can each be equipped with 1 slugga.
Any number of models can each have their choppa replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 big choppa ◦ 1 killsaw ◦ 1 power klaw ◦ 1 power stabba ◦ 1 slugga

other.name: Drive-by Krumpin'
other.description: Each time this unit Consolidates, each model in this unit can move up to 6" instead of up to 3".

special.name: SPEED FREEKS MOB
special.description: If a model from your army with the Leader ability can be attached to a Warbikers unit, it can be attached to this unit instead.

datasheets.name: Painboss
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: ■ Beast Snagga Boyz
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: Beast Snagga klaw.
wargear: This model can be equipped with 1 grot orderly.

wargear.name: Grot Orderly
wargear.description: Once per battle, in your Command phase, if the bearer is leading a unit that is below its Starting Strength, you can return up to D3 destroyed Bodyguard models to that unit.

other.name: Dok’s Toolz
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

other.name: Sawbonez
other.description: At the end of your Movement phase, select one friendly Beast Snagga Character model within 3" of this model. That model is healed and regains up to 3 lost wounds. Each model can only be healed once per turn.

datasheets.name: Painboy
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ Boyz ■ Nobz ■ Lootas ■ Burna Boyz ■ Tankbustas
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: power klaw; ’urty syringe.
wargear: This model can be equipped with 1 grot orderly.

wargear.name: Grot Orderly
wargear.description: Once per battle, in your Command phase, if the bearer is leading a unit that is below its Starting Strength, you can return up to D3 destroyed Bodyguard models to that unit.

other.name: Dok’s Toolz
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

other.name: Hold Still and Say ‘Aargh!’
other.description: Each time an attack made by this model with its ’urty syringe scores a Critical Wound against a unit (excluding Vehicle units), that unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.

datasheets.name: Rukkatrukk Squigbuggy
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: sawn-off shotgun; squig-launchas; saw blades.
wargear: None

other.name: Buzzer Squigs
other.description: Each time this model makes an attack with its squig launchas that targets an Infantry unit, add 1 to the Hit roll.

other.name: Squig Mine
other.description: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, select one enemy unit within 3" of this model and roll one D6: on a 4+, that enemy unit suffers D6 mortal wounds. Designer’s Note: Place a Squig Mine token next to the model, removing it once this ability has been used.

datasheets.name: Shokkjump Dragsta
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: kustom shokk rifle; rokkits; saw blades.
wargear: None

other.name: Shokk Tunnel
other.description: Each time this model is selected to Advance, you can remove it from the battlefield and set it up again anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models.

datasheets.name: Squiggoth
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: gorin’ horns.
wargear: This model can be equipped with 1 kannon.
datasheets.transport: This model has a transport capacity of 10 Orks Infantry models. If this model is equipped with a kannon, it has a transport capacity of 6 Orks Infantry models. It cannot transport Mega Armour, Jump Pack or Ghazghkull Thraka models.

other.name: Trample
other.description: Each time this model is selected to fight, you can select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it and roll one D6, adding 2 to the result if this model made a Charge move this turn: on a 4-5, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6+, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-6 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Squighog Boyz
datasheets.loadout: Every model is equipped with: saddlegit weapons; stikka; squighog jaws and saddlegits.
wargear: For every 3 models in this unit, this unit can be equipped with 1 bomb squig.

wargear.name: Bomb Squig
wargear.description: Once per battle for each bomb squig this unit has, after this unit ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit within 12" of it and roll one D6: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

other.name: Wild Ride
other.description: You can ignore any or all modifiers to this unit’s Move characteristic and to Advance and Charge rolls made for this unit.

datasheets.name: Stompa
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: 3 big shootas; deffkannon; skorcha; supa-gatler; supa-rokkits; twin big shoota; mega-choppa.
wargear: None
datasheets.transport: This model has a transport capacity of 22 Orks Infantry models. Each Mega Armour or Jump Pack model takes up the space of 2 models. Ghazghkull Thraka takes up the space of 18 models.

other.name: Waaagh! Effigy (Aura)
other.description: While a friendly Orks unit is within 12" of this model, each time you take a Battle-shock test for that unit, add 1 to that test.

other.name: Stompin’ Forward
other.description: Each time this model makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, it can move over models (excluding Titanic models) and terrain features that are 4" or less in height as if they were not there.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-10 wounds remaining, subtract 6 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Stormboyz
datasheets.loadout: Every model is equipped with: slugga; choppa.
wargear: The Boss Nob’s choppa can be replaced with 1 power klaw.

other.name: Full Throttle
other.description: This unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced. If it does, before making that Charge move, roll one D6 for each model in this unit: for each 1, this unit suffers 1 mortal wound. You cannot use this ability during the battle round in which you call a Waaagh!.

datasheets.name: Tankbustas
datasheets.loadout: The Boss Nob is equipped with: rokkit launcha; close combat weapon. One Tankbusta is equipped with: pair of rokkit pistols; close combat weapon. One other Tankbusta is equipped with: tankhammer. Two other Tankbustas are equipped with: rokkit launcha; close combat weapon.
wargear: None

other.name: Tank Hunters
other.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets a Monster or Vehicle unit, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll.

other.name: Bomb Squigs
other.description: Twice per battle, after this unit ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit within 12" of it and roll one D6: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. Designer’s Note: Place two Bomb Squig tokens next to the unit, removing one each time this unit uses this ability.

leadBy: Big Mek With Kustom Force Field

datasheets.name: Trukk
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: big shoota; spiked wheels.
wargear: This model can be equipped with 1 wreckin’ ball.
datasheets.transport: This model has a transport capacity of 12 Orks Infantry models. Each Mega Armour model takes up the space of 2 models. It cannot transport Jump Pack models.

other.name: Grot Riggers
other.description: At the start of your Command phase, this model regains 1 lost wound.

datasheets.name: Warbikers
datasheets.loadout: Every model is equipped with: twin dakkagun; close combat weapon.
wargear: Each Warbiker can be equipped with one of the following: ◦ 1 slugga ◦ 1 choppa
The Boss Nob on Warbike can be equipped with one of the following: ◦ 1 slugga ◦ 1 big choppa ◦ 1 power klaw

other.name: Drive-by Dakka
other.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets a unit within 9", improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

datasheets.name: Warboss

This model can be equipped with 1 attack squig.

other.name: Might is Right
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

other.name: Da Biggest and da Best
other.description: When you call a Waaagh!, until the start of the next battle round, add 4 to the Attacks characteristic of this model’s melee weapons.

datasheets.name: Warboss In Mega Armour
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: ■ Meganobz
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: big shoota; ’uge choppa.

other.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

other.name: Dead ’ard

datasheets.name: Warboss On Warbike
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: twin dakkagun; killsaw.
wargear: This model’s killsaw can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 big choppa ◦ 1 power klaw

other.name: Speedboss
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

other.name: High-octane Fuel
other.description: Each time this model’s unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in this model’s unit.

datasheets.name: Wazbom Blastajet
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: smasha gun; twin wazbom mega-kannon; armoured hull.
wargear: This model’s twin wazbom mega-kannon can be replaced with 1 twin tellyport mega-blasta.
This model can be equipped with 1 blastajet force field.
This model can be equipped with 1 twin supa-shoota.

wargear.name: Blastajet Force Field
wargear.description: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save, but it loses the Grenades keyword.

other.name: Blastajet Attack Run
other.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that cannot Fly, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Weirdboy
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: ■ Boyz
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: ’Eadbanger; weirdboy staff.
wargear: None

other.name: Waaagh! Energy
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Strength and Damage characteristics of this model’s ’Eadbanger weapon for every 5 models in that unit (rounding down), but while that unit contains 10 or more models, that weapon has the [HAZARDOUS] ability.

other.name: Da Jump (Psychic)
other.description: Once per turn, at the end of your Movement phase, one Weirdboy from your army can use this ability. If it does, roll one D6: on a 1, that Weirdboy’s unit suffers D6 mortal wounds; on a 2+, remove this Weirdboy’s unit from the battlefield and set it up again anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models.

datasheets.name: Wurrboy
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: ■ Beast Snagga Boyz
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: Eyez of Mork; close combat weapon.
wargear: None

other.name: Waaagh! Energy
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of this model’s Eyez of Mork weapon for every 5 models in that unit (rounding down), but while that unit contains 10 or more models, that weapon has the [HAZARDOUS] ability.

other.name: Roar of Mork (Psychic)
other.description: In your opponent’s Command phase, you can select one enemy unit within 18" of and visible to this Psyker and roll one D6: on a 1, this Psyker’s unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 2+, until the start of your opponent’s next Command phase, each time a Battle-shock or Leadership test is taken for that enemy unit, subtract 2 from that test.

datasheets.name: Zodgrod Wortsnagga
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: ■ Gretchin
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: Da Grabzappa; slugga.
wargear: None

other.name: Special Dose
other.description: When you call a Waaagh!, until the start of the next battle round, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in this model’s unit.

other.name: Super Runts
other.description: While this model is leading a unit: ■ Models in that unit have the Scouts 9" ability. ■ Each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll. ■ Each time an attack targets that unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.
